title: Ticket #1662: make condor_ssh_to_job with stduniv
description: LIGO is very likely going to formally request that condor_ssh_to_job work with standard universe jobs. I've mentioned to them that this is a long task to perform and it might take several weeks or months. However they state that they could very much use the feature since they use a lot of standard universe jobs.
remarks:
2010-Sep-16 22:00:47 by tstclair:
Why don't we just complete a wrapper shim for dmtcp and they can use the normal facilities in the vanilla universe?
